name: Payssion Plugin for Woocommerce
author: Payssion

sections.description:
Payssion is a global payment solution provider, that enables people to collect payments all over the world without hassle. Through Payssion platform, people could get access to 200+ local and international payment methods in over 200 countries.

Payment methods for Asia Pacific

  • Australia: Polipayment
  • China: Alipay, Tenpay, Unionpay
  • Indonesia: ATM, DOKU, Alfamart
  • Inida: UPI, Netbanking, Credit/Debit Card, Paytm
  • Japan: Credit card, Webmomey, Netcash, Bitcash
  • Malaysia: Malaysia e-banking, FPX, Touch ‘N Go, Grabpay, Boost, Maybank2u, Molpoints
  • New Zealand: Polipayment
  • Philippines: Dragonpay, Globe Gcash, Grabpay
  • Singapore: eNETS
  • South Korea: Credit Card, Internet Banking, PAYCO
  • Thailand: Thailand online Banking
  • Vietnam: VietQR

Payment methods for Europe

  • Austria: EPS
  • Belgium: Bancontact
  • France: Neosurf
  • Germany: Sofortbanking, Giropay
  • Netherlands: iDeal
  • Poland: Dotpay, P24, PayU
  • Russia: QIWI, Webmoney, Yandex.Money, Sberbank
  • Turkey: Credit/Bank Card
  • United Kindom: Pay by Bank app
  • Multiple countries: Trustly, Europen SEPA bank transfer, Paysafecard

Payment methods for Latin America

  • Argentina: Rapi Pago, Pagofacil, Santander
  • Brazil: PIX, Boleto, Itaú, Caixa, Banco Santander Brasil, Banco do Brasil, Brasil Credit Card
  • Chile: Banco de Chile
  • Mexico: OXXO, Santander Mexico, Banamex
  • Multiple countries: Boacompra

Payment methods for Middle East & Africa

  • Egypt: Fawry
  • South Africa: Online Banking, South Africa Credit Card
  • Multiple countries: Onecard

Payment methods for all countries

  • Bitcoin
sections.installation:
1. Upload the payssion folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin of WooCommerce Payssion through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce -> Settings -> Checkout -> Payssion, or you just click Settings under WooCommerce Payssion plugin.
  4. Fill in your API Key and Secret Key, which you can find after logging at your Payssion account. Click Save changes.
  5. Activate the alternative payment methods you want to use. Please note the Status of Payssion payment method is disabled in order to prevent it to show as a payment option.

1.2.4

  • add more payment options: Apple Pay (Saudi Arabia), stcpay, mada, UAE Card, Bahrain Card, Kuwait Card, Oman Card, Qatar Card, QRIS, OVO

1.2.3

1.2.2

  • add more payment options: Airtm, Nigeria Credit/Debit Card

1.2.1

  • add more payment options: Russia Card, Taiwan ATM, Taiwan Payinstore

1.2.0

  • add more payment options: Klarna, PAYCO, Indian Wallet

1.1.9

  • add more payment options: BCP, Mexico Credit Card, Efecty, Interbank, Kakaopay, PagoEfectivo, PayNow, SPEI

1.1.8

  • add more payment options: Grabpay, Brasil Credit Card

1.1.7

  • fix status issue for multiple transactions originated by the same order and add more payment options: caixa_br, creditcard_za, creditcard_br, trustly, paybybankapp_gb, grabpay_my, touchngo_my, boost_my, fawry_eg

1.1.6

  • fix cpf/cnpj input issue and add more payment options: PIX, South Africa online banking

1.1.5

  • add more payment options: Grabpay, Brasil Credit Card

1.1.4

  • add more payment options: Paytm, Mercadopago Mexico

1.1.3

  • add more payment options: ATM, DOKU, Alfamart, Malaysia e-banking, Globe Gcash, Itaú, EPS, P24, PayUIndia payment methods (UPI, Netbanking, Credit/Debit Card), South Korea (Credit Card, Internet Banking)

1.1.2

  • add more payment options: Turkish bank card, Europe bank transfer, Santander Rio Argentina

1.1.1

  • add more payment options: doku, itau, multibanco, pse, redpagos, webpay

1.1.0

  • add support for WooCommerce 3.0 (backwards compatible)

1.0.1

  • add more payment options

1.0.0

  • Initial stable release
sections.screenshots: 1. Screenshot 1 - Payssion Settings Page
sections.reviews:
Badly

By roboxkin on April 6, 2022

Bad service! Everything is colorfully painted what and how to connect, but there is no information anywhere about how you will then withdraw your money, if at all possible. I do not advise you to use such services, they only do what they lure sellers.

avoid this scam project

By webfantastic on February 22, 2021

I don't recommend it. The Chinese system where there is no technical support and honest tariffs.

Works for international merchants

By (ablears) on December 7, 2020

Payssion gave me access to a number of payment methods that are hard for me to setup as I am outside of the relevant country - eg for the Philippines market, I could use their Dragonpay plugin to access payments made to local banks/gcash etc. For Brazil, I can offer Boleto payment without having a BR bank account. Their support have always been reasonable and any issues dealt with by their tech team

Lowest Star Rating

By clickandgoph on November 25, 2020

Sign-up process is absurd. Search for Gcash in plugins listing and you will see a lot of better rates with excellent sales, support and service.

No payouts to Russian bank accounts and...

By allenleyaouanc on August 4, 2020

I was looking for a simple and reliable gateway plugin for an e-commerce website based in Russia (where Stripe doesn't work). Payssion is listed amongst few other plugins. So, I've installed the plugin and tried to understand how it works. I have created an account on payssion.com, created an "app" in order to get credentials... then, nothing. So, I have sent an email to their support, in order to go ahead and also to know their price (because of course it's not for free). Got an answer 4 days later. - Impossible to get any information about their costs. Instead of that, I got a Chinese guy from Payssion who asks me by email stupid questions about what I want to sell and where, then they will tell me how much they charge (wtf). - Then, he explains they don't do payouts to Russia (?) but they can open a bank account for me in another country. Run away!!!!!

Payssion not showing

By craybac on April 11, 2018

i installed the payssion plug-in, activated at payssion website, put the api key and secret key but at the check-out i have never seen payssion, so my question is "how can i use payssion?" if it is not showing in the check-out.

Paysson allow me to accept money

By Protium on August 14, 2017

I finally can accept money on website. It is to hard to get merchant account from others. Only bad thing in plugin is available payment methods. Some is available but not working, some I think (but not sure) not process online money directly and someone not available thought plugin... Thank you.

not so good

By Bentley06 (bentley06) on August 4, 2017

not so good, if the stripe accept so many payment method as this plugin, that would be awesome!

Not compatible with Woocommerce 3.0 / PayPal

By pydun on May 5, 2017

Nice plugin, except it does not compatible with Woocommerce 3.0 / PayPal. When activating both Paypal standard gateway and this plugin in Woocommerce 3.0, it interfered and failed some of our successsful PayPal transactions. Please update the plugin.

better service on payments gateway

By darren1313 on February 22, 2017

You can get a good service on there, they can help you fix most questions about your payments problem. It a good experience on here!
